Key Match Events: Érick Sánchez hit the woodwork in the second minute.
Luis Chávez scored in the 43rd minute.
Edson Álvarez scored a dramatic injury time goal in the 101st minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Mexico secured a 4-2 win in the shootout and a place in the Copa America.
The match was held in Mexico City's Estadio Azteca.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was tied on aggregate at 2-2.
Angel Malagon made crucial saves in the 2nd and 61st minutes.
Johan Vásquez, Gimenez, Pineda, and Huerta scored for Mexico in the shootout.
